attributes.action: Include all NHS staff in the 2020 pay rise due to be backdated from April.
attributes.additional_details: Who asked the doctors for your medication to be written up? Who managed your drug chart?! Please reconsider who are deserving of this pay rise, You spoke highly of your nurses who cared for you. Don’t let them down.
attributes.background: Include the Nurses and Health care assistants in this 2020 pay rise, Who do you think brought your food and water to you when you were admitted Boris? Who changed your bed, and walked you out to the toilet when you were un well? Who bleeped the doctors to notify them you were deteriorating?
